relation.text: Sunday the 5 th . is my dearest Miranda 's
join in their best wishes for a very very long continuance of your present good health & many years
had known my dearest Father for upwards of Forty years
years ago & he did not by any means wish
Monday my dr . A. M . wrote
put into the papers two days
breakfasted wth her on the Tuesday morning
heard nothing from him all Tuesday
Wednesday & I was compleatly miserable between hope & fear I desired
end of this week to him & explain
a year & which after his death went
